entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: ENE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 70 gusting to 100 this evening then south 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
